kv8.7:7.8: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ, atthi rasāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:7.13: atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ, atthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:7.22: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ, atthi rasāyatananti … pe …
kv8.7:8.8: Atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ, natthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:8.13: atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ, natthi rasāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:8.22: Atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ, natthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:9.1: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:9.3: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:9.6: atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:9.8: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyati … pe …
kv8.7:9.10: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:10.1: Atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ atthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:10.3: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:10.5: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:10.8: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:10.10: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:10.12: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:11.1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:11.3: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, na ca tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:11.6: atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:11.8: Atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ atthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:11.10: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:12.1: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:12.3: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, na ca tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:12.5: Atthi tattha sotāyatanaṃ atthi saddāyatanaṃ … pe …
kv8.7:12.7: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:13.1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:13.3: Atthi tattha mūlagandho sāragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho āmagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandhoti?
kv8.7:14.1: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyatīti?
kv8.7:14.3: Atthi tattha mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambilaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ loṇiyaṃ khāriyaṃ lambilaṃ kasāvo sādu asādūti?
kv8.7:15.1: Atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:15.3: Atthi tattha kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassaṃ garukaṃ lahukanti?
kv8.7:16.4: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittanti?
kv8.7:16.6: Hañci atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
